projectGridLines.title: Entrepreneur in Residence Intern
projectGridLines.description:
About the Entrepreneur in Residence Intern 

The Enrepreneur In Residence position at Vidyalai is a unique and challenging role suited to young graduates planning to start their own ventures in the future. In this program, candidates are expected to work directly with the founders in matters of strategy development, branding, and marketing, operations strategy, business development etc. This program will help candidates to understand the challenges involved in starting a new business and would leave them much more prepared to start their own ventures in the future. 

Key Responsibilities 

• Engage in strategy development 

• Work on growth marketing 

• Engage in process design 

• Conduct operations research

Required Qualifications 


• Bachelor’s degree or Master’s degree with at least 60% cumulative and no backlogs. 

• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English. 

• Strong interpersonal skills, problem-solving abilities, and a flair for presentations. • Exceptional organisational skills to manage multiple customer interactions effectively. 

Preferred Qualifications 

• Leadership experience and active involvement in college clubs, events, or co-curricular activities will be a strong plus. 

Working Conditions 

• The position is based in our Kochi office. (maps.app.goo.gl/PAbVevdQqBs5DRat8). • Workweek: Monday - Saturday. 

• The work environment is fast-paced, and the candidate should be comfortable working in a team-oriented setting.
